title: digaran
author: digaran
created_time: October 02, 2023, 12:54:09 PMLast edit: January 20, 2024, 07:19:40 AM by digaran

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: But let's see. Have you ever solved a puzzle that gave you 1,000 bitcoins as a reward? If so, I'd appreciate it if you'd sign a message so we can check it out. Before I start to warm up my head with a tutorial to solve some puzzles like that I would like to be sure that if I follow the system it will work, which I doubt that it is within everyone's reach no matter how detailed the tutorial is.
